Name: Shotgun Witch
About the game: Only armed with a double barrel shotgun, go through waves of hell spawns to get your book back! Run, dash, and shoot your way in this hard as hell arena bullet hell shooter! Complete the STORY mode to get your book back or do so in INFINITE mode in record time for bragging rights!
